short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculates the average of current estimates

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allow you to see the average of the Scrum Poker estimates on scrumpoker-online.org.

Use with your team and start removing waste of time in your Scrum planning.
